mapper.select: select * from seat where timetable_code=#{timetable_code} and isbooked=1
mapper.insert: insert into booking(booking_code, customer_ID, timetable_code, m_name, theater_name, screen_name, seat_code, seats_num, screening_date, book_date, booking_price) values(#{booking_code}, #{customer_ID}, #{timetable_code}, #{m_name}, #{theater_name}, #{screen_name}, #{seat_code}, #{seats_num}, #{screening_date}, sysdate, #{booking_price})
